title: new​
content: </> Card.new( initial: any, reducers?: table ) → Card Creates a new Card object

title: setDepth​
content: </> Card:setDepth(depth: number) → () Sets how much history is tracked and removes any excess if the history size exceeds the depth

title: getDepth​
content: </> Card:getDepth() → () Gets the depth of the card

title: getHistory​
content: </> Card:getHistory() → () Gets the history of the card depending on the card's depth

title: getReducedSignal​
content: </> Card:getReducedSignal(reducer: string) → Signal Gets the signal that will be fired for a reducer if it's dispatched

title: getChangedSignal​
content: </> Card:getChangedSignal() → Signal Gets the signal that will be fired if the value changes

title: setReducers​
content: </> Card:setReducers(reducers: table) → () Sets the reducers for the key (should typically only be set once when the Key is instantiated)

title: rawsetValue​
content: </> Card:rawsetValue(value: any) → () Sets the value without triggering any signals or history updates

title: getValue​
content: </> Card:getValue() → any Gets the current value

title: dispatch​
content: </> Card:dispatch( reducer: string, ...: any ) → () Dispatches the current reducer to update the value while firing the changed and appropriate reduced signal

title: destroy​
content: </> Card:destroy() → () Prepares card for garbage collection

title: new​
content: </> Store.new( initial?: table, reducers?: table ) → Store Creates a new Store object

title: setDepth​
content: </> Store:setDepth(depth: number) → () Sets how much history is tracked and removes any excess if the history size exceeds the depth

title: getDepth​
content: </> Store:getDepth() → number Gets the depth of the store

title: getHistory​
content: </> Store:getHistory() → table Gets the history of the store as a table

title: rawsetValue​
content: </> Store:rawsetValue( key: any, value: any ) → () Sets the state key to the value without firing any events (should be used to initialize the store)

title: rawsetState​
content: </> Store:rawsetState(state: table) → () Sets the state of the store without firing any events (should be used to initialize the store)

title: setReducers​
content: </> Store:setReducers(reducers: table) → () Sets the reducers for the store

title: getValue​
content: </> Store:getValue(key: any) → () Gets the value of the key in the store

title: getState​
content: </> Store:getState() → table Returns the state of the store

title: dispatch​
content: </> Store:dispatch( key: any, reducer: string, ...: any ) → () Dispatches args to the reducer for a key

title: getReducedSignal​
content: </> Store:getReducedSignal( key: any, reducer: any ) → Signal Returns a reduced signal that will be fired if that reducer is used on the key

title: getChangedSignal​
content: </> Store:getChangedSignal(key: any) → Signal Returns a signal that will be fired if the passed key value is changed

title: destroy​
content: </> Store:destroy() → () Cleans up the store object and sets destroyed field to true

title: new​
content: </> Keeper.new() → Keeper Creates a new Keeper object

title: getCard​
content: </> Keeper:getCard(key: any) → Card | nil Gets the card from the key

title: createCard​
content: </> Keeper:createCard( key: any, value: any, reducers?: table ) → Card Creates the card and fires keyAdded or throws if it exists

title: removeCard​
content: </> Keeper:removeCard(key: any) → Card Removes the key and fires keyRemoved or throws if it doesn't exist

title: destroy​
content: </> Keeper:destroy() → () Prepares keeper for garbage collection
